name: Mapster WP Maps
author: Mapster Technology Inc

sections.description:
Mapster’s on a mission! With Mapster WP Maps, we’re trying to make the best map editor and creator available for WordPress. So many of the existing plugins out there are outdated, difficult to use, and, worst of all, hide really basic features behind a paywall.

Check out Mapster WP Maps Pro for much more advanced features such as mass editing, huge imports, store locators, hover styling, and more.

With WordPress Maps, we currently integrate MapLibre (the open source Mapbox), Mapbox, and Google Maps.

Learn more about the plugin, get started, and check out the documentation at https://wpmaps.mapster.me/.

We also have a site full of examples at https://wpmaps.mapster.me/examples/!

You can use this plugin with or without access tokens and API keys, however you need.

A few features across different map types include:

  • Live map editor as you change and edit your map
  • Ability to add circles, markers, text, lines, polygons, and popups to your maps, and style them in many ways
  • Unlimited number of maps, unlimited features and markers
  • Control over map size, display, controls on the map, interactivity, and more
  • Integration of location searches, directions plugins, and more to come

We have a feature request forum open where you can feel free to submit feature requests and we will prioritize and respond to these.

This plugin effectively replaces our previous WP Mapbox GL JS plugin, which was a bit old and difficult to develop. This new plugin is much simpler to use and allows much more efficient development and bug fixing.

We have some FAQs and instructions up at https://wpmaps.mapster.me/, with more coming in the coming months! Please hit us up with any feature requests or bugs that you run into.

Love,

Your Friends at Mapster
sections.installation:
1. Upload mapster-wp-maps.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add an Access Token if you would like to use custom Mapbox styles or geocoders
  4. Click on “Maps” to start building your maps.
  5. Use the provided shortcodes to output these maps in your posts or widgets.
sections.faq:
Something seems broken!

Get in touch with us at https://wpmaps.mapster.me/ and we’ll message you back right away.

I’m not sure which type of map I should make!

No worries, we have posts to help you understand at https://wpmaps.mapster.me/.

Do you have X feature?

Email us at https://mapster.me, write a feature request, or leave a comment in the WordPress Support Forum.

1. Map editing interface.

sections.reviews:
Top-Notch Support Service

By jinnjoint on April 14, 2024

Best plugin in the category (if not the only real option) and excellent support.

By far the most comprehensive Map plugin I have tried

By Matt (myBCN) on January 22, 2024

I have long lost count on how many different types of plugins I have tried for maps. Since I found Mapster I have stopped looking. I have a very demanding and very specific need with literally thousands of locations, lines and areas that needs to be added, with custom pins, and there is simply nothing else that does it so well as this one, even in the free one. On top of all, Victor is amazingly responsive and helpful.

Most flexible Map plugin + quick and dedicated support

By albertodga on January 12, 2024

This plugin can do so many things, especially if you want to step away from google maps (GDPR anybody?). I can only recommend the PRO version, its features give it that extra edge that managing big websites or complicated imports becomes much less stressy and time consuming.

Victor is very dedicated with the support, answers in 24h and always has a solution or a coherent explanation.

Thumbs up

Best support

By adryjay on December 18, 2023

Great plugin and super support. I had a little issue that was promptly resolved by the developer! Thanks a lot!

Awesome plugin

By missioncode on November 17, 2023

By far the best maps plugin available huge customisation options and excellent support - highly recommended

Excellent plugin & outstanding support

By ljtodd on November 16, 2023

This plugin is EXCELLENT. I have developed mapbox-based applications from scratch using mapbox gl js and this plugin provides everything out of the box you will need within the comfort of a WordPress install. The data importer is fast and impressive and their plugin support is outstanding. There were a couple of features I asked about and they delivered a patch release within a few days. I also asked about a potential bug and it was fixed promptly too. I highly recommend this plugin.

Great Support - Great Product

By Ryan Brinkhurst (rdbrinkhurst) on November 1, 2023

The level of support offered for this plugin is amazing. They helped me troubleshoot a multifaceted issue I was having for days. They are quick to respond and very knowledgeable. I highly recommend this plugin.

Five stars

By massimo1980 on October 26, 2023

I’m impressed with both the plugin and the developer’s technical support. Thanks to Victor

Support at its best!

By danielti on October 26, 2023

The plugin works very nice and is easy to use!
BUT much more I appreciate the support.

I had an issue and wrote an mail to the support guys. I didn’t expect that amount of patience and willing to solve my problem.

Big thanks to Victor for your support! I’m looking forward to install the update 😊

The best map plugin

By fhty on October 5, 2023

5 stars, well deserved. Great set of features, reliable and fantastic support!

short_description: Mapster WP Maps is the smoothest, easiest way to make maps for your site. No API keys required.
